title: How to Make Cucumber Side Salad

steps.headline: Slice an onion in half and remove the skin.
Then proceed to cut from bottom to top in 1/8th inch slices.
Do the same with the tomato (optional item).
Slice it the same way as the onion, leaving round slices.
Chop up a handful of cilantro with the stem.
Pour half a teacup of white vinegar.
Add a few sprinkles of salt.
Mix together by hand - gently separating the onion pieces.
Add a little more vinegar and mix again.
Add the Chopped Chillies if adventurous or garnish with whole ones (optional).
Serve with Indian food (biriyani or rice pilaf).

text: Slice an onion in half and remove the skin.  Then proceed to cut from bottom to top in 1/8th inch slices.  Do the same with the tomato (optional item).  Peel the cucumbers.  Slice it the same way as the onion, leaving round slices.  Chop up a handful of cilantro with the stem.  Place in a bowl together.  Pour half a teacup of white vinegar.  Add a few sprinkles of salt.  Mix together by hand - gently separating the onion pieces.  Add a little more vinegar and mix again.  Add the Chopped Chillies if adventurous or garnish with whole ones (optional).  Place in refrigerator for 5-10 minutes.  Serve with Indian food (biriyani or rice pilaf).
